data.meta_site_name: Glyn Marsh Obituary | November 19, 2019 | Owens Funeral Home - Champaign, IL
data.text:
Glyn O. Marsh, 71, of Champaign died on November 19, 2019 at Carle Foundation Hospital, Urbana.

Glyn was born on July 26, 1948 in Pineville, LA. Glyn was a distinguished Marine Corps veteran of the Vietnam War; where he received the Purple Heart for his service.

He is survived by his wife, Kamala of Champaign; son, Glyn O. Marsh, II of Champaign and 2 sisters, Nettie Marsh York of Kingwood, TX and Gloria Marsh Mouille of Palmetto, LA.

A private graveside service will be held at Danville National Cemetery. Military rites will be accorded.
